AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Court: court that imposed judgment of conviction and sentence, may accept guilty plea and enter final judgment
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States: country where Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa was removed from and later found, and party to a plea agreement and prosecutor in the case
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Bureau of Prisons: custody provider for Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa's imprisonment
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Mexico: country where Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa is a native and citizen
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Department of Homeland Security: department whose Secretary can grant permission to re-enter the United States
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Attorney General: official who can grant permission to re-enter the United States
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Sentencing Commission: issuer of the Guidelines Manual, consulted in determining sentence
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Judge: judge before whom the defendant pleads guilty
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Magistrate Judge: judge who recommends acceptance of guilty plea
